function.name: cleaningOption_turnOn
function.description: This function is used to activate a specific cleaning mode on the robot vacuum cleaner.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to turn on the cleaning option.

mode.description: The cleaning mode to turn on.

rvcLocation.description: The location to turn on the cleaning option.
